articles.title: Chinese Moviemen's Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Moviemen's Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A Chinese moviemen's delegation headed by Zhao Haicheng, assistant president of the China Film Group Corporation, arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: School Youth and Children's Oratorical and Agitation Contest Held
articles.content:
School Youth and Children's Oratorical and Agitation Contest Held
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A national oratorical and agitation contest among of members of hobby groups of schoolchildren's palaces (halls) and youth halls took place at the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace between Sept. 21 and 25.
					The contest brought together 300 group members selected in various provincial contests.
					
					In their oratorical and agitation numbers on diverse themes the performers highly lauded the great life and immortal revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk and successfully represented the immense happiness and joy of the school youth and children across the country given an ample opportunity of learning and having their hopes and talents in full bloom under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: System of Directing Production Paying Off
articles.content:
System of Directing Production Paying Off
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A system of directing production developed by Kim Chaek University of Technology has been introduced into different units of the national economy and proved effective.
					 The system is paying off at the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory and other units.
					
					 The unique real-time system not only monitors the multi-channel camera image signals and sound signals through modern instruments and retrieve them but also makes it possible to take measures against possible dangerous situation that can be happened on the spot with the help of various sensing elements and alarm devices.
					
					 It can grasp all the processes from carriage of raw materials and their processing to forwarding of products in a systematic and detailed way.
					
					 It is of a significance in upgrading the IT and scientific level of production direction and management in industrial establishments as required by the IT era.

articles.title: Provocative Remarks of S. Korean Defense Minister-Designate Slammed
articles.content:
Provocative Remarks of S. Korean Defense Minister-Designate Slammed
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Thae Yong, south Korean defense minister-designate speaking at the recent confirmation hearing at the "National Assembly," let loose a string of dangerous outbursts referring to the "north's arsenal of nuclear weapons" and blustering that it is possible to "mount a preemptive attack on it". 
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					What he uttered cannot be construed otherwise than an extremely dangerous provocation. Openly asserting a military strike at the other side in any case is an intolerable rash act. 
					
					He seemed to have the view that anyone who wishes to become a minister of Defense should maintain such degree of anti-DPRK stand and belligerence. It is the height of an anachronistic viewpoint.  
					
					Already at the time when Kim held the post of chairman of the joint chiefs of staff in the early period of "the pragmatic government" he, speaking at the NA, let loose outbursts calling for mounting a "preemptive attack" on the DPRK, deteriorating all of a sudden the north-south relations which had favorably developed.  The above-said call made by Kim for a military strike at the DPRK goes to prove that the idea of north-south confrontation is still prevalent in the ruling quarters of south Korea. 
					
					Such rash behavior should not be tolerated any longer as long as the confrontational maniacs go reckless, unaware of how things are going in the world, and thus make a mess of important affairs of the nation. 
					
					The north-south relations should not be allowed to be reduced to a plaything of a tiny handful of confrontational elements.
					
					An opportunity does not come always. 
					
					The south Korean conservative forces would be well advised to stand to reason and face up to the reality and drop their obstinate policy of standing in confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Hold Higher Banner of Korean Nation- First Spirit
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Hold Higher Banner of Korean Nation- First Spirit
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- All the Koreans in the north and  the south and overseas should achieve national reunification under the uplifted banner of the Korean nation-first spirit and thus demonstrate once again the dignity and might of the Korean nation before the whole world.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday urges this in a signed article.
					
					 The Korean nation is a talented, highly civilized and resourceful homogeneous nation with a long history and excellent cultural tradition and a clever and sagacious nation with excellent national culture and tradition, the nation more patriotic than any other nation in the world, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation which earned fame in the world, demonstrating its long history and culture, was divided into the north and the south by foreign forces in the middle of the 20th century.
					
					 All Koreans, be they in the north and the south or overseas, do not want to live separated but unanimously desire the unity of the nation and the reunification of the country.
					
					 The immense pride and self-respect for the advantages of the nation and the Korean nation-first spirit serve as an ideological and moral source of strength that encourages all the members of the Korean nation to devote themselves to the sacred cause for the sake of the country and the nation.
					
					 Only when all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas have a strong resolution to glorify the advantages of the nation and the firm will to build a dignified and prosperous reunified power without fail through their concerted efforts, is it possible to achieve reconciliation and unity and surely settle any issue arising in accomplishing the cause of reunification.  
					
					Rosy is the future of the Korean nation as General Secretary Kim Jong Il, supreme incarnation of patriotism, is leading the movement for national reunification and the Korean nation is fully ready to preserve and develop its brilliant history and excellent identity.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Joint Declarations Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Joint Declarations Called for in S. Korea 
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- Members of the Democratic Labor Party in south Korea staged a grand bicycle march for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration on Sept. 21. 
					Before the start of the march, they held a press conference at the Jeju Island Assembly on the same day. 
					
					The speakers at the press conference called for thoroughly implementing the said declarations in order to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					They declared they would conduct the grand bicycle march in different parts of south Korea from Jeju Island to Kangwon Province of south Korea, prompted by the desire for peace and reunification. 
					
					This grand march will help boost the desire of the people for improving the inter-Korean relations as early as possible through the implementation of the declarations, they added.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk's Demise Commemorated in Colombia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk's Demise Commemorated in Colombia
 Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia issued a bulletin titled "Great Mother who Gave Birth to the Brilliant Commander of Songun and Brought Him up" on Sept. 19 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk took arms in her hand and protected legendary hero President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life in the first half of the 20th century when Korea was under Japan's military occupation, thus performing distinguished feats to be recorded in the history of modern Korea.
					
					 She helped General Secretary Kim Jong Il grasp the idea of attaching importance to arms and military affairs in the arduous period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and in the busy days of building a new country after the liberation and paid deep attention to instilling matchless courage and grit into him.
					
					She presented her son with a "general's uniform," prompted by her strong desire to see him grow up to be a brilliant general who would succeed to the cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Before breathing her last, she earnestly told her beloved son to loyally uphold Kim Il Sung.
					
					 As desired by Kim Jong Suk, Kim Jong Il has creditably carried forward the cause of the President, making his august name widely known to the whole world as a great brilliant commander of Songun protecting and glorifying the sovereignty of the DPRK and leading the cause of global independence to victory, the bulletin concluded.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Lauded by Italian Figure
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Lauded by Italian Figure
Pyongyang, September 26 (KCNA) -- A representative of the Italian Branch of the Korea Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on Sept. 22 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 He in the statement said Kim Jong Suk took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle with arms in her hand in her early years, thus making a great contribution to the cause of liberating Korea, and after the liberation she rendered great services for building a new society, regular armed forces and self-reliant national defence industry. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 She performed a great exploit by making sure that the revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung was successfully carried forward generation after generation.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of the President is being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the Korean people will achieve great successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation, pursuant to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Efectuado concurso nacional de oratoria, explicacion y agitacion
articles.content:
Efectuado concurso nacional de oratoria, explicacion y agitacion
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 21 al 25 en el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Pyongyang el Concurso Nacional de Oratoria, Explicacion y Agitacion de los integrantes de los grupos de los Palacios (Casas) de Escolares y Ninos y las Casas de Jovenes.
					En la ocasion participaron 300 miembros de los grupos, seleccionados en los concursos de todas las provincias.
					
					A traves de la oratoria, explicacion y agitacion compuestas de diversos temas, los ejecutantes elogiaron altamente la gran vida e inmortales hazanas revolucionarias de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y demostraron bien la felicidad y alegria infinitas de los jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais quienes bajo el regazo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il estudian a sus anchas y hacen florecer plenamente sus esperanzas y talentos.

articles.title: Sistema de mando general sobre lugar de produccion
articles.content:
Sistema de mando general sobre lugar de produccion
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, el sistema de mando general sobre el lugar de produccion de gran valor real se introduce activamente en diversas ramas de la economia nacional. 
					El sistema surte gran efecto en numerosas unidades, entre otras, el Complejo Termoelectrico de  Pukchang y la Fabrica de Alambres Electricos 326 de Pyongyang.
					
					A traves de los equipos modernos el nuevo sistema  vigila, registra y averigua constantemente los signos visuales y foneticos de camara de multicanal.
					
					Utilizando los elementos sensibles y los alarmadores, el sistema hace tomar las medidas necesarias a las circunstancias de peligro que ocurren en el lugar de produccion y dispone de las funciones de manejo en su conjunto.
					
					Tambien, hace conocer de modo general y detallado todos los procesos desde el transporte y elaboracion de materias primas hasta el envio de productos en los lugares de produccion.
					
					Este sistema de mando desarrollado por la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek reviste un significado en la labor para mejorar el nivel de la informatica y la cientifizacion en el mando de produccion y las actividades administrativas de las fabricas y empresas conforme a la demanda de la epoca de la industria de informatica.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia palabras provocativas de Kim Thae Yong
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia palabras provocativas de Kim Thae Yong 
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Hace unos dias, Kim Thae Yong, comparecido en la "audiencia de la Asamblea Nacional para la confirmacion del nombramiento" como el candidato al ministro de Defensa, dijo que es "posible realizar el ataque preventivo" contra "el lugar de arsenal de las armas nucleares del Norte de Corea".
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual difundido este sabado, lo califica de la provocacion sumamente grave y prosigue:
					
					Es imperdonable, en todo caso, la declaracion del ataque militar contra otra parte.
					
					Parece que el piensa en que para tomar el cargo del ministro de "Defensa" hay que tener la posicion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de tal grado y el caracter agresivo, pero, su pensamiento es tan anacronico.
					
					Antes, Kim, que se habia encargado del primer presidente de la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor del "gobierno pragmatico", solto palabras "golpe preventivo" contra la RPDC en dicha "Asamblea Nacional", lo cual empeoro en un santiamen las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea que se desarrollaban favorablemente. Por lo tanto, la declaracion de tal ataque militar sirve de una prueba evidente de que se reina todavia en el interior de la capa gobernante del Sur de Corea la concepcion de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					No deben ser perdonadas por mas tiempo tales conductas de los surcoreanos que perjudican la labor importante de la nacion. Las relaciones Norte-Sur no pueden ser objeto de engano para quienes persiguen el enfrentamiento.
					
					No es eterna la oportunidad. Las fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea deben ver correctamente la realidad sin perder el juicio y abandonar la anacronica politica de confrontacion con los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a enarbolar bandera de dar prioridad a nacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a enarbolar bandera de dar prioridad a nacion
Pyongyang, 26 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben manifestar otra vez en el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la nacion al lograr la reunificacion de la patria enarbolando la bandera de dar prioridad a la nacion coreana.
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y continua:
					
					La nacion coreana es la homogenea talentosa y civilizada que tiene la larga historia y la destacada tradicion cultural. Tambien posee el patriotismo mas fuerte que otras naciones del mundo.
					
					La nacion coreana, que ha manifestado su nombre en el mundo creando la larga historia y la cultura, esta dividida en el Norte y el Sur por las fuerzas extranjeras desde mediados del siglo pasado.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar no quieren vivir por separados sino anhelan unanimemente la unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					El infinito orgullo y la dignidad sobre la superioridad de la nacion y el espiritu de dar prioridad a la nacion coreana son la fuente ideo-espiritual que permite a todos los miembros de la nacion consagrarse a la sagrada causa de la patria y la nacion.
					
					Cuando todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar poseen la firme decision de hacer brillar la superioridad de la nacion y la poderosa dignidad nacional de construir sin falta la potencia reunificada, digna y prospera uniendo las fuerzas entre nosotros, los connacionales, pueden realizar ciertamente la reconciliacion y la unidad y resolver con certeza cualesquier problemas que se presentan en la realizacion de la causa de la reunificacion.
					
					Es radiante el porvenir de la nacion coreana porque el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, maxima personificacion del amor por la patria y la nacion se halla en la delantera del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria y hay la nacion coreana dispuesta a mantener la esplendida historia nacional y la excelente  nacionalidad.
